15 void Classifier::init(std::string attributes,
16  std::string categories,
17  std::string examples_dir,
18  int examples_num) {
19  loadAttributes(attributes);
20  loadCategories(categories);
21 
22  _nb = new NBint(_attribs, _cat);
23 
24  std::string example;
25  for(int i = 0; i <= examples_num; ++i) {
26  example = examples_dir + std::to_string(i) + ".txt";
27  loadExample(example);
28  }
29 
30  _nb->train(_ex);
31 }

40 void Classifier::loadAttributes(std::string attributes) {
41  std::vector<std::string> word_list;
42  std::ifstream input;
43  input.open(attributes);
44  std::string word;
45 
46  while(input >> word) {
47  word_list.push_back(word);
48  }
49 
50  int A[] = {0, 1}; // A generic binary attribute,
51  // using int to allow int category
52 
53  int index = 0;
54  for(std::string w : word_list) {
55  _attribs.push_back(faif::createDomain(w, A, A+2));
56  _attrib_index[w] = index++;
57  }
58 }
59 
67 void Classifier::loadCategories(std::string categories) {
68  std::ifstream input;
69  input.open(categories);
70  std::string word;
71  int index = 0;
72 
73  while(input >> word) {
74  _cat_index[word] = index++;
75  _cat_list.push_back(word);
76  }
77 
78  int C[_cat_list.size()]; // An int category mapping strings,
79  // to ints (NB is highly templated
80  // as such using ints seemed to be
81  // a hasle free way to go)
82 
83  for(std::size_t i = 0; i < _cat_list.size(); ++i) {
84  C[i] = i;
85  }
86 
87  _cat = faif::createDomain("", C, C+_cat_list.size());
88 }
89 
97 void Classifier::loadExample(std::string example) {
98  std::ifstream input;
99  input.open(example);
100  std::string word;
101  int cat;
102  if(!(input >> word)) {
103  throw;
104  }
105  cat = _cat_index.at(word);
106 
107  int E[_attrib_index.size()]{};
108  while(input >> word) {
109  if(_attrib_index.find(word) != _attrib_index.end()) {
110  E[_attrib_index.at(word)] = 1;
111  }
112  }
113  _ex.push_back(faif::ml::createExample(E, E+_attrib_index.size(), cat, *_nb));
114 }
115 
123 std::string Classifier::classify(std::string example) {
124  std::ifstream input;
125  input.open(example);
126  std::string word;
127 
128  int E[_attrib_index.size()]{};
129  while(input >> word) {
130  if(_attrib_index.find(word) != _attrib_index.end())
131  E[_attrib_index.at(word)] = 1;
132  }
133  ExampleTest et = createExample(E, E+_attrib_index.size(), *_nb);
134 
135  std::stringstream ss;
136  ss << _nb->getCategory(et);
137  word = ss.str();
138  word.erase(0, 1);
139  return _cat_list.at(std::stoi(word));
140 }
